title: 2 women, teen found dead in South Georgia; GBI investigating
title_page: 2 women, teen found dead in South Georgia; GBI investigating
text:
The GBI is investigating three deaths in a small South Georgia town, the agency said Tuesday afternoon.
“Two females [and] 1 teenager,” the GBI said in a tweet about the situation in Charlton County. The agency said the public is no longer in danger.
Update: Two females + 1 teenager is confirmed deceased. There is no immediate threat to the community. https://t.co/33xdpOucrH — GA Bureau of Invest (@GBI_GA) October 30, 2018
The investigation is ongoing in St. George, according to the Florida Times-Union. The town is close to the Georgia-Florida border.
The GBI said more information should be released after authorities notify the victims’ next of kin.
﻿In other news:
